Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    ratpack.exec.ExecResult.getRegistry()
    ratpack.stream.WriteStream.itemMap(Action<? super O>)
    since 1.4, use WriteStream.itemMap(Subscription, Action)
    ratpack.exec.Promise.next(Promise<O>)
    replaced by Promise.replace(Promise) as of 1.1.0
    ratpack.exec.Promise.of(Upstream<T>)
    replaced by Promise.async(Upstream)
    ratpack.exec.Promise.ofLazy(Factory<T>)
    replaced by Promise.sync(Factory)}
    ratpack.func.Block.operation()
    since 1.5
    ratpack.util.Types.promiseOf(Class<T>)
    since 1.5, no replacement.
    ratpack.util.Types.promiseOf(TypeToken<T>)
    since 1.5, no replacement.
    ratpack.registry.Registry.single(Class<T>, Supplier<? extends T>)
    use Registry.singleLazy(Class, Supplier)
    ratpack.stream.TransformablePublisher.streamMap(Function<? super WriteStream<O>, ? extends WriteStream<? super T>>)
    since 1.4, use TransformablePublisher.streamMap(StreamMapper)
    ratpack.stream.Streams.streamMap(Publisher<U>, Function<? super WriteStream<D>, ? extends WriteStream<? super U>>)
    since 1.4, use Streams.streamMap(Publisher, StreamMapper)
    ratpack.exec.Promise.wrap(Factory<? extends Promise<T>>)
    since 1.5, replaced by Promise.flatten(Factory).
